home.title: Order an airport transfer
home.flightInfoMessage: Enter your flight number, e.g., PS352 or W6123. This helps the driver track your request.
home.signSubtext: The driver will wait with your name

error.fillFields: Please fill in the "From" and "To" fields.
error.noAdults: There must be at least one adult passenger.

addCommentModal.title: Add a request
addCommentModal.subtitle: Write important info for the driver: child seat, large luggage, or other details.
addCommentModal.cancelConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to permanently cancel this transfer?

transferSuccess.title: Request sent!
transferSuccess.subtitle: Drivers have received your request and will send their offers shortly.

authScreen.title: AirChat: Airport Transfers
authScreen.driverLogin: Are you a driver? Log in

registration.title: Create an account
registration.subtitle: Dive into the world of transportation!
registration.fillAllFields: Please fill in name, email, and password.
registration.confirmationEmail: Success! Please check your email to confirm registration.
registration.mustAgreeToTerms: You must agree to the Terms of Use.

resetPassword.title: Reset password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your email to receive a password reset link.
resetPassword.emailSent: If this email is registered, you will receive instructions to reset your password.

profile.noPhoneDriver: The driver hasn't specified a phone number.
profile.shareMessage: Check out the profile of driver {{driverName}} in the {{appName}} app: {{link}}
profile.loginToWrite: Please log in to message the driver.
profile.passengerInfoBody: Public profiles are only available for drivers. Passengers do not have public pages.

settings.title: Settings
settings.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to log out?
settings.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters.
settings.modeInfoText: Driver mode allows you to view and accept requests. Passenger mode hides the driver interface, letting you use the app as a regular passenger.
settings.clearCacheBody: This will remove all downloaded images from your device's memory. They will be downloaded again when needed. Continue?
settings.deleteAccountBody: This action is irreversible. All your data, chats, and transfers will be permanently deleted. Are you sure?
settings.deleteSuccessBody: Your account has been successfully deleted.

bannedModal.title: Account banned
bannedModal.message: Your account has been banned by an administrator due to a violation of community guidelines. You cannot use the app.
bannedModal.contact: If you believe this is a mistake, please contact support.

support.title: Support
support.formSubtitle: Leave your feedback, report a problem, or suggest an idea.
support.messageEmpty: The message field cannot be empty.
support.messageSent: Thank you! Your feedback has been sent.

transferDetail.title: Trip Details
transferDetail.noOffers: No offers yet. Please wait, drivers will respond shortly.
transferDetail.changeDriverConfirmText: Your trip will become available for offers from other drivers again.

transfersScreen.title: My transfers
transfersScreen.emptyState: Add your first transfer and hit the road!
transfersScreen.emptyArchive: Your archive is empty. Completed and cancelled trips will appear here.
transfersScreen.deleteConfirmBody_one: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected transfer? This action cannot be undone.
transfersScreen.deleteConfirmBody_few: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected transfers? This action cannot be undone.
transfersScreen.deleteConfirmBody_many: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected transfers? This action cannot be undone.

completed.title: Completed
completed.text: The trip has been successfully completed.

offersAvailable.title: Offers available
offersAvailable.text: Choose the option that suits you best.

alerts.callFailedCheckDevice: Could not make the call. Check if your device supports calling.
alerts.phoneNotFoundBody: This driver hasn't specified a phone number.
alerts.confirmCallBody: Are you sure you want to call the driver ({{phoneNumber}})?

onboarding.welcomeText: Plan trips, book airport transfers, communicate with drivers ‚Äî all in one place.
onboarding.configureText: Choose the date, time, number of passengers, and luggage.
onboarding.readyText: Click the button below to get started.

successModal.title: Request created!
successModal.subtitle: We will notify you when a driver accepts your order.

chatList.title: Messages
chatList.noChats: You have no active chats yet.
chatList.deleteBody: Are you sure you want to delete the chat with {{name}}? All message history will be lost.
chatList.blockReasonRequired: Please specify a reason for blocking.
chatList.blockReasonSubtitle: This report will be sent to the administrator.
chatList.blockBody: You will no longer see messages from this user, and they won't see yours. Are you sure?

chat.galleryPermissionError: Permission to access the gallery is required.
chat.cameraPermissionError: Permission to access the camera is required.
chat.locationPermissionError: You must grant access to your location.
chat.deleteMultipleConfirmBody_one: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected message?
chat.deleteMultipleConfirmBody_few: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected messages?
chat.deleteMultipleConfirmBody_many: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected messages?
chat.noMessages: No messages yet. Send the first one!
chat.messageNotFound: Message is too old, scroll up

driverHome.title: Available transfers
driverHome.noFiltersSet: You haven't set up service areas. You are seeing all requests.
driverHome.noRequests: No available requests at the moment

driverOffer.offerSent: Your offer has been sent to the passenger!
driverOffer.noOtherOffers: You are the first to make an offer!
driverOffer.alreadyOffered: You have already sent an offer
driverOffer.passengerNotified: The passenger has received your offer. Wait for their response.

authPrompt.title: Authorization required
authPrompt.subtitle: To order a transfer, please log in or register.

flights.title: Flight schedule
flights.emptyList: No flights on the selected date
flights.subtitle: Choose a route and date to view available flights.
flights.selectParamsAndSearch: Select parameters above and press search to see the schedule.

errors.networkSubtitle: Could not connect to the server. Check your internet connection.

myTrips.title: My trips
myTrips.emptyList: You don't have any accepted trips yet
myTrips.noPhone: The passenger hasn't specified a phone number.

passenger.step1: Create a trip request: specify where from, where to, and when you plan to travel.
passenger.step2: Wait for drivers going your way to respond to your request and offer a price.
passenger.step3: Review the offers from drivers and choose the one that suits you best.
passenger.step4: Agree on details in the chat with the driver and meet at the designated time. Have a nice trip!

driver.step1: Browse the feed of requests from passengers looking for transport along your route.
driver.step2: Respond to an interesting request by indicating your price for the trip.
driver.step3: Chat with the passenger to agree on details (meeting point, luggage, etc.).
driver.step4: Pick up the passenger at the specified location and hit the road. Have a safe journey!
